questions: Q. 1. How power resources are classified ?
answers: Ans. Power resources may be broadly categorised as conventional and non-conventional resources.

questions: Q. 2. What are conventional sources of energy ?
answers: Ans. Conventional sources of energy are those which have been in common use for a long time. Example- Firewood.
